pageTitle: Patent US4673823 - Apparatus for operating cycloconverters in parallel fashion - Google Patents
textBeforeTable: Patent Citations (8) Where respective cycloconverters are individually operated under a light load condition or under a heavy load condition, a distribution control is carried out to circulate current in the cycloconverters operated under the light load condition and to circulate less current in the cycloconverters operated under the heavy load condition, thus making it possible to prevent the current capacity of the converter from being increased. (7) Where circulating currents in respective cycloconverters are increased under the condition of a light load operation, a control is effected to decrease the number of distributed capacitors connected of the power factor compensating capacitor depending upon the magnitude of the circulating current command value, thus improving the operation efficiency. (6) Where the sum of a lagging reactive power of the entirety of the cycloconverter system exceed the capacity of the power factor compensating capacitor due to an overload operation, a control is conducted to maintain circulating current command values delivered to the respective cycloconverters at fixed values unequal to zero, thus always realizing an operation without losing the characteristic of the circulating current type cycloconverter. (5) It is possible to operate a plurality of cycloconverters with a high efficiency at the same time. (4) There is no possibility that an unnecessary circulating curren will flow, thus making it possible to reduce the capacity of power transformers or converters.
